newsitem.title: POLAND: Zloty fixed flat at 2.49 pct from parity rate.
newsitem.headline: Zloty fixed flat at 2.49 pct from parity rate.

text.p: The National Bank of Poland fixed the zloty at 3.1595 to the dollar, up from 3.1630 on Tuesday and at 1.8295 to the mark, down from 1.8260, the central bank said.
The central bank fixed the zloty at an average of 2.49 percent from the weighted dollar and mark parity rates, unchanged from Tuesday.
The zloty was fixed at 2.52 percent from the floating parity rate, which changes in line with intraday currency movements on world markets, against Tuesday's 2.47 percent fix.
